proposed DRCN.from sentence: The proposed DRCN obtains an accuracy of 88.9 % which is a competitive score although we do not use any external knowledge like ESIM + ELMo and LM - Transformer .

accuracy.sets: new state - of the - art performance

achieves.from sentence: The ensemble model achieves an accuracy of 90.1 % , which sets the new state - of the - art performance .

53 m parameters ( 6.7 m 8 ).from sentence: Our ensemble model with 53 m parameters ( 6.7 m 8 ) outperforms the LM - Transformer whose the number of parameters is 85 m .

encoding - based method.from sentence: Furthermore , in case of the encoding - based method , we obtain the best performance of 86.5 % without the co-attention and exact match flag .

Our plain DRCN.from sentence:
shows the results on MATCHED and MISMATCHED problems of MultiNLI dataset .
Our plain DRCN has a competitive performance without any contextualized knowledge .

our model.from sentence: And , by combining DRCN with the ELMo , one of the contextualized embeddings from language models , our model outperforms the LM - Transformer which has 85 m parameters with fewer parameters of 61 m .

obtained.from sentence:
Pair shows our results on the Quora question pair dataset .
We obtained accuracies of 90.15 % and 91.30 % in single and ensemble methods , respectively , surpassing the previous state - of - the - art model of DIIN .

TrecQA and SelQA datasets.from sentence:
TrecQA and SelQA shows the performance of different models on TrecQA and SelQA datasets for answer sentence selection task that aims to select a set of candidate answer sentences given a question .
However , the proposed DRCN using collective attentions over multiple layers , achieves the new state - of the - art performance , exceeding the current state - of - the - art performance significantly on both datasets .
